title: Devouring Heaven Chant - Novel Updates
tags: Cultivation   Male Protagonist   Transmigration   Weak to Strong
author: Tie Ma Fei Qiao   铁马飞桥
description: He was just an ordinary soul from Earth who transmigrated to a foreign realm. However, Chen Xuan finds a powerful cultivation method and embarks on a path of devour. He trains in the techniques of killing and slaughters millions to reach the top. In the journey of cultivation, fortunes come and so do menacing perils. Despite this, he has his soulmates to accompany him on his path.>
